name: Hacker News - Terminal
description: A theme based on typical "green text black background" terminal windows.
additional_info:
Version 0.1.1 Release Notes/Changelog:   [Version 0.1.1]
  • Removed "Courier New" from font-family entries. Text should appear more readable across different systems.
  [Version 0.1.0]
  • Fixed comment header links having a brighter color than expected
  [Pre-release]
  • Added global rules, removed unnecessary specialized class/child rules
  • Combined link rules using shorthand
  • Styled elements for logged-in users
  • Styled inputs with black backgrounds with contrasting text
Developed in Firefox 38.0.1 PLEASE comment if you have any suggestions :)
